note.p: Birth: 'The Mount', Shrewsbury, Shropshire, England (09 or 12 February 1809)
Death: Down, Kent (19 April 1882)
Burial: Westminster Abbey
Research Field: Natural history, geology, evolution
Education: School at Shrewbury; Edinburgh University (medicine); Christ's College, Cambridge. BA (1831); MA
Career: Naturalist to HMS Beagle (1831-1836), including visit to New Zealand (1835); published "The origin of species" (1859) and other works
Memberships: Hon RSNZ (1871)
Membership: Fellow
Election Date: 24/01/1839
Medals/Prizes: Copley Medal 1864; Royal Medal 1853
Council: VP 1854-1856
Sources: Bulloch's Roll; DNB; DSB
